full_threads.body:
Hi David,

Sure, we have updated the text.
https://staging-stellainsurance-dec2022.kinsta.cloud/travel-insurance-quote/

Hi Joel,

One small tweak, can it be Search destinations in the search box with destinations lower case? Magnifying glass to remain.

Thanks

David

All working now, thanks Joel!

Simon

Simon Dixon

CTO

m +44 7944439324

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Simon,

Thanks, confirming the redirect url has been updated.

Hey Joel,

One more small update we need. For the domestic quotes, we need you to update the product in the querystring on the handover url. Currently it's using stella_pr_travel , this needs to be updated to stella_pr_travel_domestic

Current url
https://stella-test.au.aventus.app/quote/new?quoteId=f9ed9cf3-5c6c-4bdd-d712-2b7dc1030d87&productReference=stella_pr_travel&autoNext&click_source=stella-website&click_medium=quickquote&click_campaign=travelinsurance
becomes

https://stella-test.au.aventus.app/quote/new?quoteId=f9ed9cf3-5c6c-4bdd-d712-2b7dc1030d87&productReference=stella_pr_travel_domestic&autoNext&click_source=stella-website&click_medium=quickquote&click_campaign=travelinsurance


Thank you

Simon

Simon Dixon

CTO

m +44 7944439324

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Natalie,

Sure, confirming we have updated the form.
https://staging-stellainsurance-dec2022.kinsta.cloud/travel-insurance-quote/

Hi Joel,

We have noticed the text we had requested to be displayed, when the new 'Australia - Domestic' option is selected, is not appearing below the box. Are you able to get this implemented please, as per the screen shot below?



We would also like to make the country/destination selection process clearer to the customers, firstly by making it clear that they are able to type in the country/destination, by adding a search icon and the text 'Search Destination' into the box, similar to the screen shot below please?



And secondly, to make the list below slightly bigger when the customer clicks into it, to partially display the next destination (Indonesia) and make the scroll bar more visible please?



Best regards,
Nat.

Natalie Smith Senior Project Manager m +44 7786458292 w stellainsurance.com.au w withstella.co.uk

full_threads.body:
Hi Again,

Apologies, I forgot to mention this in the earlier email, but when the changes are made, please can they be deployed to staging first?

Best regards,
Nat.

Natalie Smith Senior Project Manager m +44 7786458292 w stellainsurance.com.au w withstella.co.uk



NOTICE
This e-mail and any attachments are CONFIDENTIAL and may contain legally privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient of this e-mail message, please telephone or e-mail us immediately, delete this message from your system and do not read, copy, distribute, disclose or otherwise use this e-mail message and any attachments. Although Stella believe this e-mail and any attachments to be free of any virus or other defect which may affect your computer, it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure that it is virus free and Stella does not accept any responsibility for any loss of damage arising in any way from its use.

Hi,

We have added a new Domestic Travel product that we will be providing quotes on, as well as the existing International Travel product. This means that we require you to apply some updates to the Travel Quick Quote journey for us please, which I have listed below. All being well, we are aiming to put the new product Live w/c 17th Feb and will keep you posted on the likely specific go live date for this. Please can you confirm if these changes will be within our retained resource allocation or if they will incur any additional costs?

The required changes to the quick quote journey are detailed in the attached screen shot. In summary, we require you to add a new travel destination (Australia - Domestic) to appear as the 4th item in the list and apply logic, so that when this new option is selected the customer will not be able to add any other international destinations or view them. If any other destination is added then this new destination should not appear on the list.

We have added a new domestic section to our API documentation (link below). We have removed Australia in transit from the destination list and would like the list order within the UI to match the ordering of the Destinations list at the bottom of the below link please.

https://withstella.notion.site/Travel-Quick-Quote-820f56068e9a44e8b6b162304ab7f9fe#c2c9fa95b03a4c56b316c305dd62c2c1

Please let me know should you require any further information.

Best regards,
Nat.



Natalie Smith
 Senior Project Manager
 m +44 7786458292
 w stellainsurance.com.au
 w withstella.co.uk
